subject: Anyone have experience with Confluence and jUnit?
msgSnippet: Our group is thinking of adopting Confluence and as one of the ardent jUnit testers I ve been asked to investigate it. Does anyone have any experiences
messageBody:
Our group is thinking of adopting Confluence and as one of the ardent
jUnit testers I've been asked to investigate it.

Does anyone have any experiences (good/bad) with it? Are there any large
projects that use it? Good places to get started on it?

Thanks in Advance!
